Address.value: 275 SEVENTH AVENUE 9TH FLOOR, NEW YORK, New York, 10001, United States

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: Amalgamated Financial Corp is a bank holding company. It is a full-service commercial bank and a chartered trust company. It provides commercial banking and trust services nationally and offers a range of products and services to commercial and retail customers. It offers a complete suite of commercial and retail banking, investment management, and trust and custody services.

value.name: Sean Searby
value.title: Chief Operating Officer & Executive Vice President
